dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Kazhydromet has issued a pretty intense forecast for the next few days, starting April 17th.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Kazhydromet has issued a pretty intense forecast for the next few days, starting April seventeenth.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazhydromet has issued a weather forecast for Kazakhstan for April 17, 18, and 19.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, a northwestern cold front is moving in, right? Gonna hit most of the country.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, a northwestern cold front is moving in, right? Gonna hit most of the country.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the forecast, most of Kazakhstan is expected to experience worsening weather conditions due to a northwestern cold front.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. The eastern regions are in for the worst of it on Wednesday—heavy precipitation, even some snow.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. The eastern regions are in for the worst of it on Wednesday-heavy precipitation, even some snow.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On April 17, conditions will be especially harsh in the eastern regions, where heavy precipitation is expected, including snow in some areas.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And the temperatures there, um, they're dropping to minus one to minus six Celsius at night? That's chilly for April.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the temperatures there, um, they're dropping to minus one to minus six Celsius at night? That's chilly for April.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the northern, central, and eastern regions, nighttime temperatures will drop to "1 to "6ÂC, and daytime temperatures will only reach +1 to +8ÂC.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and daytime highs only reaching like, plus one to plus eight. Not exactly spring picnic weather.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and daytime highs only reaching like, plus one to plus eight. Not exactly spring picnic weather.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the northern, central, and eastern regions, nighttime temperatures will drop to "1 to "6ÂC, and daytime temperatures will only reach +1 to +8ÂC.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Meanwhile, over in western Kazakhstan, it's a totally different story—no precipitation at all.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Meanwhile, over in western Kazakhstan, it's a totally different story-no precipitation at all.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Meanwhile, in western Kazakhstan, no precipitation is expected and the weather will be warmer.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And way warmer! They're looking at daytime temps from plus seventeen up to twenty-eight degrees.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And way warmer! They're looking at daytime temps from plus seventeen up to twenty-eight degrees.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Daytime temperatures will rise from +17¦+22ÂC up to +23¦+28ÂC.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: That's a huge difference across one country. Almost like two different seasons happening at once.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's a huge difference across one country. Almost like two different seasons happening at once.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And don't forget the wind—gusts of fifteen to twenty meters per second everywhere.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And don't forget the wind-gusts of fifteen to twenty meters per second everywhere.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Across Kazakhstan, wind gusts of 15"20 m/s are also forecasted, along with fog during the night and early morning hours.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh right, and fog overnight and in the early mornings too. That could make for some tricky driving conditions.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh right, and fog overnight and in the early mornings too. That could make for some tricky driving conditions.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Across Kazakhstan, wind gusts of 15"20 m/s are also forecasted, along with fog during the night and early morning hours.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Especially in those mountainous and foothill areas where they're expecting rain mixed with snow at night.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Especially in those mountainous and foothill areas where they're expecting rain mixed with snow at night.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In mountainous and foothill areas, rain mixed with snow is expected at night, and heavy rain is possible during the day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And then heavy rain during the day? That's a messy transition.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then heavy rain during the day? That's a messy transition.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In mountainous and foothill areas, rain mixed with snow is expected at night, and heavy rain is possible during the day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Plus, uh, frosts down to minus three in some spots overnight. Farmers are gonna be watching that closely.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Plus, uh, frosts down to minus three in some spots overnight. Farmers are gonna be watching that closely.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Frosts of up to "3ÂC are expected in some areas overnight.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. It's one of those swings that really tests the early crops.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. It's one of those swings that really tests the early crops.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely a week to keep an eye on the forecast if you're traveling or working outdoors.
